scripts.test-crossbrowser-e2e: NODE_PATH=. codeceptjs run-multiple ${BROWSER_GROUP:-'--all'} -c saucelabs.conf.js --plugins retryFailedStep --steps --grep '@crossbrowser' --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test-e2e-standalone: SHOW_BROWSER_WINDOW=yes NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run tests/createAndUpdateCase.js  -c ./ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-create-and-update: SHOW_BROWSER_WINDOW=yes NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run tests/createAndUpdateCase.js  -c ./ --steps
